question: Who was named the next Ambassador of India to the Federative Republic of Brazil?
explanation: Ashok Das was named the next Ambassador of India to the Federative Republic of Brazil. Ashok Das is an Indian Foreign Service (IFS) Officer of the 1987 batch. Currently he is Additional Secretary in the Ministry of External Affairs. He has been appointed as the next Ambassador of India to the Federative Republic of Brazil. He will soon take charge as the Ambassador of India to the Federative Republic of Brazil.
